chunk_number: 8
title: Gemini Safety Settings Class
summary: The `GeminiSafetySettings` class is a TypedDict that defines safety settings options for Gemini model requests, specifying categories of harm and thresholds for blocking content. It includes literals for various harm categories and their respective blocking thresholds. For further details and examples, refer to the linked Gemini API documentation.

```
classGeminiSafetySettings(TypedDict):
"""Safety settings options for Gemini model request.
  See [Gemini API docs](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/safety-settings) for safety category and threshold descriptions.
  For an example on how to use `GeminiSafetySettings`, see [here](../../agents.md#model-specific-settings).
  """
  category: Literal[
    'HARM_CATEGORY_UNSPECIFIED',
    'HARM_CATEGORY_HARASSMENT',
    'HARM_CATEGORY_HATE_SPEECH',
    'HARM_CATEGORY_SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT',
    'HARM_CATEGORY_DANGEROUS_CONTENT',
    'HARM_CATEGORY_CIVIC_INTEGRITY',
  ]
"""
  Safety settings category.
  """
  threshold: Literal[
    'HARM_BLOCK_THRESHOLD_UNSPECIFIED',
    'BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE',
    'BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE',
    'BLOCK_ONLY_HIGH',
    'BLOCK_NONE',
    'OFF',
  ]
"""
  Safety settings threshold.
  """
```
